content.en: Cloud Service Optimization: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize and improve cloud service composition in cloud computing environments. These algorithms, such as NSGA-II, MOPSO, DGABC, COM2, Greedy-WSC, ACO-WSC, Hybrid genetic and fruit fly optimization algorithm, HPSO technique, EMOABC, LS-NSGA-II-DE, CSA-WSC, EMaO algorithms, IACO algorithm, Adaptive genotypes evolution based genetic algorithm, Particle swarm optimization algorithm with principles of ant colony optimization algorithm, Angle and adversarial direction driven search, Hybrid metaheuristic algorithm, and Multi-agent ant colony optimization algorithm, are being used to address different research questions related to optimizing cloud service composition and achieving quality of service (QoS) awareness. These algorithms employ nature-inspired meta-heuristic techniques and optimization-based approaches to efficiently find and select cloud services for composition, ultimately improving the overall performance and efficiency of cloud computing systems.
content.da: Optimering af Cloud Service: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere og forbedre cloud service-sammensætning i cloud computing-miljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom NSGA-II, MOPSO, DGABC, COM2, Greedy-WSC, ACO-WSC, Hybrid genetisk og fruit fly optimeringsalgoritme, HPSO-teknik, EMOABC, LS-NSGA-II-DE, CSA-WSC, EMaO-algoritmer, IACO-algoritme, adaptiv genotyper evolution baseret genetisk algoritme, partikelsværmsoptimeringsalgoritme med principper fra myrekolonioptimeringsalgoritme, vinkel- og modstridsretning-drevet søgning, hybrid metaheuristisk algoritme, og multi-agent myrekolonioptimeringsalgoritme, anvendes til at håndtere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til at optimere cloud service-sammensætning og opnå kvalitetsservice-bevidsthed (QoS). Disse algoritmer benytter naturinspirerede meta-heuristiske teknikker og optimeringsbaserede tilgange til effektivt at finde og vælge cloud services til sammensætning, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer den overordnede præstation og effektivitet af cloud computing-systemer.
